p: 10% (w/w) ointment of L. angustifolia was formulated by incorporating 10g of EO in 100g petroleum jelly for skin irritation assessment. Ointment was examined for their physical properties including viscosity, spreadability, extrudability, homogeneity, and physical appearance using methods described in Bora et al. [ 18] and Nair et al. [ 19].
